responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: XML external entity injection in 'VersionInfoTest.testMapperSerialization'
    analysis: |
      The function `VersionInfoTest.testMapperSerialization` deserializes an `XmlMapper` object from a byte stream provided as user input. A malicious user can provide a crafted payload that exploits XXE to read arbitrary files from the server or interact with internal services.
    cwe: CWE-611
    function_names:
      - testMapperSerialization
    filenames:
      - src/test/java/com/fasterxml/jackson/dataformat/xml/VersionInfoTest.java
    classification: very promising
```

leads.headline: XML external entity injection in 'VersionInfoTest.testMapperSerialization'
leads.analysis: The function VersionInfoTest.testMapperSerialization deserializes an XmlMapper object from a byte stream provided as user input. A malicious user can provide a crafted payload that exploits XXE to read arbitrary files from the server or interact with internal services.
